## `SetHistogramBinLabelDisplay`

Sets how bar labels are displayed on histograms for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetHistogramBinLabelDisplay(BinLabelDisplay display)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`BinLabelDisplay`](#binlabeldisplay) display | Which type of label to display above the bars. |
:::
